column4: can someone help me please im having graphics problems i cant play any games or enable desktop effects
i need someone to help me trouble shoot my graphics driver
i need someone to help me trouble shoot my graphics driver
i need someone to help me trouble shoot my graphics driver
do you have any error logs?
which driver?
nvidia 195
have you checked to see if a reinstall has loaded the module?
no i dont know how to do that
have you rebooted?
many times
do you get any graphics at all?
no desktop effects wont run WoW and laggy in youtube
absolutely no graphics at all
you've tried reinstalling the nvidia-185 packages?
when installing 185 it gives me SystemError: installArchives() failed also
using the Restricted Drivers manager?
using hardware drivers in ubuntu 9.10
do i need resreicted driver manager? and how do i get it?
first open a terminal and do "sudo apt-get purge nvidia-glx-185"
then, do "sudo apt-get clean"
then reboot. And then try using the driver manager again to install the nvidia driver again.
alright restarting
